bibl.title: with contributions by A. BENAISSA, L. CAPPONI, W.E.H. COCKLE, J. DE JONG, C. MELIADÒ, A. NODAR, A. SYRKOU, J.D. THOMAS, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXII (Nos 4844-4930). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 92.)
bibl.note: tabl., 1 arbre généal. et XVI pll. coul.

P. Oxy. LXII, 4844-4930. - I. New Testament (4844-4845). - II. Hexameter Poetry (4846-4853). - III. Rhetorical Texts (4854-4855). - IV. Documents of the Roman Period (4856-4892). - V. Documents of the Byzantine Period (4893-4930).
